questions: Is hail damage covered under the current property policy?
Should I wait for insurance approval before making temporary repairs?
How long do I have to file a claim after the hailstorm?
Will the payout be based on replacement cost or actual cash value (ACV)?
Will the insurance cover upgraded materials (e.g., impact-resistant shingles)?
If there's hidden damage discovered later, will that be covered too?
Is wind damage covered under the standard homeowners or property policy?
Do I need to document and photograph all damages before cleaning up?
Should I make temporary repairs to prevent further damage?
Does the policy cover upgrades required to meet new building codes (code upgrade coverage)?
Should I keep damaged property until the adjuster reviews it?
